titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to limit unauthorized use of credit cards by discouraging theft of credit cards that are mailed.

bill.summary: 3/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the Truth in Lending Act to set a deadline by which the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and certain agencies are required to issue regulations designed to discourage theft of credit cards that are mailed.
